Advice to creditors, or, A safe and secure way to secure bad debts such debts as the debtors are poor and are not able to pay them ... / by one who is a lover of Christianity. One who is a lover of Christianity.
8 p.
Printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Guillim, London : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Caption title. Imprint taken from colophon.
